description: This file defines the MockPollControlCluster class, which simulates a Poll Control Cluster in a Zigbee-like device environment. It provides methods to send check-in events and to set cluster attributes, typically used for testing or simulation purposes within the larger device cluster framework.
external_methods: new ComcastPollControlCheckinEvent(this, battVoltage, battUsedMilliAmpHr, temp, rssi, lqi, retries, rejoins).send()

classes.name: MockPollControlCluster
classes.description: A mock implementation of a Poll Control Cluster used for testing or simulation in Zigbee device environments.

methods.name: sendCheckIn
methods.description: Triggers a check-in event, simulating a device check-in procedure.

methods.name: sendComcastCheckIn
methods.description: Sends a Comcast-specific check-in event with detailed parameters such as battery voltage, temperature, RSSI, etc.

methods.name: setAttributeData
methods.description: Overrides the method to set attribute data, currently always returning success.

calls: comcast.xh.zith.mockzigbeecore.event.ComcastPollControlCheckinEvent(this, battVoltage, battUsedMilliAmpHr, temp, rssi, lqi, retries, rejoins).send()
